verbose_text: In summary, we have revealed that selective inhibition of SIRT2, a Class III histone deacetylase, can significantly improve survival, attenuate sepsis associated cytokine production and coagulopathy, and reduce bone marrow atrophy in a lethal CLP model.
evidence: histone deacetylase, can significantly improve survival, attenuate sepsis-associated cytokine production and coagulopathy, and reduce bone marrow atrophy in a lethal CLP
